column1: El-Eulma (Arabic: العلمة‎) is a city in Algeria
column2: located some 210 miles east of the capital Algiers. It is the second-largest city in Sétif Province with a population of 305
column3: 130 (1998 census). In the French colonial period the city was known as Saint Arnaud after Marshal Jacques Leroy de Saint Arnaud.
